title: Emerald Enchantment: Modern Kundan Haaram with Pearl Accents
materials: Crafted in high-quality alloy with a lustrous gold-tone finish. Adorned with sparkling cubic zirconia (CZ) stones and genuine emerald green gemstones. Features delicate freshwater pearls. Meticulously crafted with a Hyderabadi polish for enduring brilliance.
features: This exquisite haaram features a contemporary Kundan setting, seamlessly blending traditional techniques with a modern aesthetic. The intricate design incorporates floral motifs accentuated with vibrant green emeralds. The central pendant boasts a mesmerizing tear-drop design, further embellished with smaller emeralds and lustrous pearls. The necklace sits gracefully with a mesh gold-tone chain.
colors: Predominantly gold with striking emerald green gemstones and the soft glow of natural pearls. The green and gold combination is a timeless classic
highly revered in South Indian jewelry.
occasions: festive occasions like Sankranthi and Diwali
or any special event where you want to make a statement. Also suitable for modern celebrations like cocktail parties and upscale gatherings.
description: This haaram is a testament to exquisite craftsmanship and timeless elegance. The modern Kundan setting offers a fresh take on traditional South Indian jewelry, making it a versatile piece for both traditional and contemporary wardrobes. The high-quality materials ensure durability and lasting brilliance, making it a cherished heirloom for generations to come. The vibrant emeralds symbolize prosperity and good fortune, adding a layer of cultural significance.
